title: Side bar hyperlink are not hidden by height css
body:
CSS 

.nested-menu {
        .list-group-item {
            cursor: pointer;
        }
        .nested {
            list-style-type: none;
        }
        ul.submenu {
            height: 0;
        }
        & .expand {
            ul.submenu {
                list-style-type: none;
                height: auto;
                li {
                    a {
                        color: #FFF;
                        padding: 10px;
                        display: block;
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }

HTML

<div class="nested-menu">
                <a class="list-group-item" (click)="addExpandClass('pages')">
                    <span>

                         Account

                </a>
                <div class="nested" [class.expand]="showMenu === 'pages'">
                    <ul class="submenu">
                        <li>
                            <a [routerLink]="['account/password']" (click)="eventCalled()">
                                <span>Password reset</span>
                            </a>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                            <a [routerLink]="['account/user']" (click)="eventCalled()">
                                <span>User</span>

                </div>
